const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "custom_lowercase_example",
  settings: {
    analysis: {
      analyzer: {
        greek_lowercase_example: {
          type: "custom",
          tokenizer: "standard",
          filter: ["greek_lowercase"],
        },
      },
      filter: {
        greek_lowercase: {
          type: "lowercase",
          language: "greek",
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
